name: Gladiator of Awesome
description:
You are a gladiator in the future. Your job is to entertain the masses.

How to play:

WASD to move, 

Mouse to Aim, 

Left click to Attack, 

Right click to Dodge,

Escape to Reload Scene.

Side note: There were plans for adding  a story system with mechanics of tension and release, making you pace your own playthrough. The spectator would give you a rating on how "awesome" your playthrough was. But that was too ambitious. So I could just finish this in time. ^^ yep I know there is nor Game Over Screen, nor a Start Screen.

I hope you enjoy :3
